data.title: The Love Triangle That Changed the Course of Zionism
data.meta_description: As the Centennial of the Balfour Declaration Approaches, It's Fitting to Look at the Love Affair at the Very Top of the British Government Whose Dramatic End Helped Pave the Way for the Issuing of the Historic Declaration About a National Homeland for the Jewish People
